Colin Farrell won the 
Golden Globe for Best Actor in a Motion Picture Musical or Comedy last night, and whomst presented him with the award, you ask? Thatd be Ana de Armas. And Colin wasted no time… [+3079 chars]

articles.title: Tár review – Cate Blanchett is perfect lead in delirious, sensual drama - The Guardian
articles.description: As the maestro heading into crisis in Todd Field’s outrageous tale, Blanchett’s performance pierces like a conductor’s baton through the heart
articles.content: A second viewing has swept away with hurricane force the obtuse worries I had at the Venice film festival about Todd Fields entirely outrageous, delirious and sensual psychodrama starring Cate Blanch… [+3181 chars]
